name: Bagas's Mod
tagline: little knowledge about mods can lead you to an big success :)..
body:
![](http://www.droid-life.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/Minecraft-Logo.png)

### Welcome to my page.

Hello guys, this is my official page for my mods. almost all of my mods is herobrine mod, im herobrine's fan, lol.

`function visitorHook() {
  clientMessage("Hello!")
    I.give(thanks)`



### About me
I am a modder, i like herobrine, he is cool, but dangerous sometimes, and herobrine does not exist in MCPE, so i created some mods to add him in game, im working on Extreme Herobrine 3, version Alpha 4.0, its going to be a huge mod.

P.S I'am an animator too lol :P

### Mods
My mods:
* Extreme Herobrine
* Extreme Herobrine 2
* Extreme Herobrine 3
* Herobrine Kit 1.3
* Entity 303 Boss Battle
* AltBrine
* SuperBrine
* Enderman voices(WARNING DO NOT USE THIS)

### Copyright for my mods
Â© 2014 Bagas

Copyright: YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO COPY, EDIT, AND CLAIM AS IF ITS YOUR MOD, DOING SO WILL BE BANNED FROM THE SITE.
